ðŸ“– Summary: Kreuzberg is a Python library providing an async interface for text extraction from diverse document formats. It prioritizes local processing and minimal dependencies, making it suitable for RAG applications and resource-constrained environments. Both single-item and batch processing are supported via async and sync APIs.
